page.title: 17TRAFFIC IN POYNTON
page.content: Number of vehicles per hour using the following roads on the 1st and 2nd July 1985 at mid-afternoon. London Rd.Nth.1332, Park Lane.588, Dickens Lane.300, Clumber Rd.168, Dickens Lane Copp Farm.180, Gorswood Farm.36, Wood Lane Sth.30, Street Lane Adlington.24, Skellern Green Farm.24. There is a possibility that in the future there might be a by-pass round Poynton to reduce the traffic passing through the village.The other major traffic problem is Park Lane where people do much of their shopping.Car parking has been restricted,and the Parish Council aim to stop parking altogether,by encouraging shopkeepers to open up their backyards to make space for a long thin car park,and to have a pedestrian crossing.
